subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Henry Blanco singled home the winning run with the bases loaded in the 11th inning, and the Chicago Cubs beat the St. Louis Cardinals, 3-2, to keep up their domination this season at Wrigley Field. Chicago improved to a National League-best 44-16 at home, matching last year’s victory total at Wrigley.
